desc.en: The AS112 is an anycasted cluster of the nameservers that answer rDNS lookups for private network and link-local addresses, which can not be answered correctly. Providing negative answers reduces the load on the public DNS infrastructure.
desc.zh: AS112 是名称服务器的任播集群，用于回答无法正确回答的专用网络和链路本地地址的 rDNS 查找。 提供否定答案可减少公共 DNS 基础架构的负载。

desc.en: This location allows the clearnet and the DN42 network to peering and exchange traffic.
desc.zh: 此地点允许公网与 DN42 网络进行对等互联和流量交换。
